timeline.bodyText:
I have lost some of my memory on this code path:
just a question: does this work with deep nested ROW? E.g. ROW(ROW(ROW(...)..)...)
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: nit: ideally such unparse should happen within operator classes. But since we implement it in Beam it is just ok.
timeline.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: I thought about replacing SqlRowOperator with our own custom operator. But I like this better, because it only overrides unparsing without affecting the rest of the operator code.
replies.author: ibzib

timeline.bodyText: Why does the outerSchema need to be nullable here?
timeline.author: robinyqiu

replies.bodyText: That must have been left over from a previous iteration. I removed it.
replies.author: ibzib

timeline.message: Test schema does not need to be nullable.
